name: 創新設計（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【VDU0253  創新設計（一）】
description: 本課程為設計課程，藉由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，引導學生實驗與創新，產生新的原創觀點。
syllabus: The main objective of this course is to inspire students to consider issues related to the use of information technology in developing intelligent technologies for the user needs. Through basic course instruction, students are encouraged to develop and apply their imagination and creativity to the creation of actual smart products. As such, the course content includes the following: Lectures and seminars hosted by healthcare professionals to provide students with a better understanding of clinical practice, relevant smart devices, systems and services, and the user needs.
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【VDU0253  創新設計（一）】
